choices: The Real World makes a terrible RPG!
1.content:
First, Let's start off with what kind of set up were dealing with here:

1. The Real World makes a terrible RPG!
A young teenager wakes up one day and discovers that his life now operates under the rules of an RPG, things don't go well. Gaining levels in certain skills or job classes or using certain items may end up transforming him into something he would rather not be.

2. Every Hero-Fodder has his Day
You are the weakest grunt in the evil Demon lord's army, trying to find a way to survive even if it means messing with destiny. Every time he or any of the heroes die the world resets, but he remembers. The heroes need Exp and will try to kill him on sight. He must find a way to defeat the heroes without killing them or else he's stuck.

3. The Ultimate Power!
A group of adventurers are trying min max their stats and end up doing some strange things to get stronger.

4. Persuasion Battle
Whenever you have a conversation with someone, it turns into turn-based battle with debates. Doing Terrible can result in you doing things you would rather not. No realizes the battles take place but you, so be careful.

More Options!
1.title: The Beginning

choices: Ignore it for now: maybe your just seeing things
Tinker with the UI: try to figure out whats going on
See if you can change one of the stats some how
11.content:
You are Erik Small, 14 years old and you love RPGs. About ninety percent of your entire library of games are RPGs. You had just finished a particularly long game session of Disgaea, trying to grind a single character to have just the right stats and skills. You paid little attention when your mom called you down for dinner with your 9 year old sister Susie and your 16 year old sibling, Jake and Samantha (Sam for short).

Although hungry and tired, you managed to persist until 10 pm, where you decided to go get late night snack to help you power through the rest of the evening. Quickly downing a glass of milk and taking a jar of peanuts, you looked forward to the rest of evening. However, as you reenter your room, you almost immediately collapse on you bed and pass out due to exhaustion.

---

Waking up the next day was a chore but, you were able to eventually open your eyes. However, something strage struck you. There was this huge transparent text box in front of you. You could only tell it was transparent since you could see your wall behind the text, it read:
[Your Life!:The Game:The Reality]

'What the?' you groggily squeaked out as the text box disappeared only to be replaced by an all too familiar UI.

It had your name listed with a couple of drop down menus titled [Jobs], [Skills], [Titles], [Stats] and [Relationships].
With a tap from your finger the Stats menu opens up and it is huge. Though you were listed as level 1, There seemed to be a stat for everything, health and the usual stats were there but coupled some obscure ones: Physical Age and Mental Age, Masculinity and Femininity, etc. it was nuts!
11.title: The Real World makes a terrible RPG!

"Whatchu doing?" Susie asks you

112.content:
As you try to navigate the large amount of tabs and screens, seeing a experience bar for literally all activities, equipment, your character history... for some reason. You notice a tab that seems out of place, put in the very end of all the menus: The Re-spec Tab. In RPG's, re-specing was perfect for fixing mistakes for building your character without having to start over from the beginning. Once you clicked on the tab, a message came up:

>WARNING! Re-spec will re-roll all of your stats and relationships randomly however you will be given several prompts throughout your life and be given what choice you made previously at that time. These choices will affect how your base stats develop to your current level. After the Re-spec is complete, you will wake up at the current time and location. You can only Re-spec once every 3 days after Re-spec.

>Continue? Y/N

A part of you was interested. How random did it re-roll your stats? Was there fixed limit to stat point allocation? Questions like these plagued your mind more than the serious ramifications of altering the course of your life.

Do you use the Re-spec?

1121121.content:
You stare at the interface. You don't like the way its been 'respeccing you' and decide to abort - but with a start, you realize that, though you clearly had a plan for being able to back out of the respec process if it looked bad before you started it...you can no longer remember what that plan was. With a frown, you go to try and tinker with the interface...and realize that it no longer seems familiar, or even intuitive to you.

With a sudden shock of realization - it hits you. You've lost your videogame skill completely. The interface looks like nothing you've ever used before, because it was based off of a videogame interface. Or at least, you remember concluding that. You don't really know now. It kinda looks like one, you guess?

You'd better rectify this immediately.

You instruct the scenerio-generator to stay home and play with your brother doing videogames and acting masculine.

A screen flashes by with the results:

Rolling for masculinity check: Rolling...

>Masculinity check failed.

Rolling for concentration to fake interest in videogames: Rolling...

>Success.

The scenario updates you with some of the results:

Feeling insecure about your masculinity, you stay at home and follow your older brother around, claiming to be interested in his video-games. He sees you as a pest, barely tolerating you, but eventually deciding to let you play with him 'a little' if you'd leave him alone. You loose badly, and he makes fun of you, stating that if you spent more time acting like a boy and less time parading around in dresses, you'd be more like a normal boy. You run to your room, and spend the rest of the day crying until your sister comes home and finds you.

Updated Stats:

>Masculinity Lost
>Relationship with Brother Deteriorated
>Relationship with Sister Increased
>Self-Esteem Down

New Mental Traits:
>Gender Dysphoria Gained
>Dislike: Video-games

New Life Event: Traumatic Memory

You look at the interface in shock, trying to pierce it together. How in the world did you make it *worse*? You were trying to -increase- those stats, not lower them further! You become intensely irritated at the videgame, and try in vain to figure out how to abort and get out of the respec screen - failing, and trying over and over until you scream in frustration. You are shaking your hands and pacing back and forth when you realize - your frustration is because you now dislike videogames. With a dawning sense of horror, you realize this...thing...can effect your mind.

No, no no!

And then you spot the other trait it said you gained. Gender Dysphoria?

Oh crap,


You have to find a way to fix this. And fast. You click through to the next scenario:

The screen flashes: "You are nine years old and have been taking dance lessons with your older sister. However, you've been feeling jealous of the other students, as they get to wear a variety of colorful, bright and sparkling outfits, and you typically wear a loose white t-shirt and black pants. The dance recital is approaching, and its upsetting you more and more. How do you handle this?"

Oh crap. This *cannot* be a major life event for you. It simply cannot. What have you gotten yourself into? You have a hard time imagining any version of you where this was even on the horizon, let alone a concern. Hopefully you can find a way to fix this...

Do you...

"You drop out the night before the recital, telling your mother that you don't want to be a dancer anymore. Confused, your mother and older sister confront you. At first, you insist that you want to be more like your brother." Here, you breath a sigh of relief. 'This is finally going in the right direction!', you reflect. Then with horror, you read the rest of it. "Not believing that, your parents interrogate you and finally learn the truth; you are upset you can't dance like the other girls. You explain that you'd rather do something where you can be treated like a girl, and wear the same outfits they do. Your mother and sister discuss it, and force you to go ahead with the dance recital - but enroll you in figure skating lessons under a girl's name you pick out. The outfit is very graceful, and very sparkly - and most of the same skills transfer over."

Crap. Crap. Crap. How do you keep making this worse? How?

112112111.content:
As you click through from life event to life event, your sense of dread increases. The person in this rapidly evolving scenario doesn't sound like you at all. The family is the same, but every concern they've had in their life feels different. Every relationship they've had is different, their interests are different. Your almost six feet tall, enjoy playing videogames, and occasionally work out. You can't imagine yourself as the person this 'Respec' character generation is describing. Your sense of horror slowly gives way to a more resigned shock. This thing can't really change anything, can it? This is starting to seem unreal.

But despite the denial, you know its all too real.

Your click through to yet another scenario, watching as your younger self - or what this interface is claiming your 'new' younger self will be when the respec finishes - focuses more and more on figure skating, dancing, art, fashion and other traditionally feminine activities, even going by a girl's name. With horror, you realize he...she?...is even enrolled at school under a girl's name, and you wonder what your first girlfriend would have thought of that, let alone the guys you hang out with. Would they even be caught dead with you in this hypothetical new reality? You wonder.

The newest scenerio has you doing more and more figure skating, first on a state level, then a national level. With mounting disbelief, as you continue to make choices and click through - you notice your younger self is competing in what appear to be, if your reading it properly - international events, albeit at the 'junior' level. Under the girl's division. How can that even be possible?

You try and pull up the stats screen. Your current stat screen shows you as you are now; with some changes. Apparently some changes have slipped through, like the skill changes and some mental effects, but most mental and physical effects are pending the completion of the respec process. You think. Its hard to tell now; presumably because your former videogame skills have been deleted. With a few minutes of fiddling, you manage to get the 'new' status screen to pop up. And you just stare in disbelief.

The image is of what appears to be a young girl, tiny and delicate, looking more like an elf or the most graceful and elegant of ballerinas then anything you ever remember looking like. She's wearing makeup, the sort that dancers and figure skaters and other women and girls wear for performances; but it seems to enhance the delicate, elven look rather then detract from it. How can this be you? No. No. No, nononononono.

In complete panic, you look over the physical stats. She...he...it...you...should have hit puberty by now. But she's significantly shorter then you were at that age. Much, much shorter. She doesn't have an adams apple, she lacks any shoulders or masculine bone structure. How can this be possible? How?

Then, under 'medical history' you find it. Hormone Therapy- Age 11.

Age 11. You never went through puberty as a guy. They stopped it. And that was already several years ago in the respec process. If you allow the respec process to continue as-is, your going to turn into some older version of this delicate, artsy, graceful creature. Could you be her? Could you somehow gain the chance to do another respec? And if so, how long could your willpower hold out against her life and the changes?

Perhaps...you reflect. Perhaps if you minimize the respec window...and just never finish the Respec, perhaps you can just ignore it indefinitely. Or perhaps it will time out. Some games do that. On the other hand, it might try and autofinish it for you. Its a risk either way.

Do you...

11211213.content:
None of the options sound very good; and your not certain that your mom and sister would have been 'okay' with you quitting the night before a recital. Not that you'd ever be caught *dead* going to a dance recital, but hypothetically speaking, it seems like the sort of thing that might alarm them. Like if you'd quit a sport the night before a game, they might ask why. And your not sure your younger self could articulate something like 'my future self doesn't like the way my life is going'; and seeing how things have turned out thus far, you don't think its worth the risk. You want to deescalate things, not make them worse.

Fortunately, your instincts turn out to be correct.

Status Changed the screen flashes, before updating the scenario.

"You speak to the dance instructor after practice one night, explaining that you'd like a better outfit. After talking with you and your older sister, they agree to help you find a boy's outfit with a bit more jazz to it. You end up much happier as a result; and when the next year of dance instruction starts, take several more forms of dance, getting really into it. You become known for your young, stylish sense of fashion, despite your age - and though some tease you, you take it in stride. You become quite popular with the other kids taking dance classes, and cease worrying so much about the difference between 'boy stuff' and 'girl stuff' - your just you.

You do end up with a slight case of hero-worship of your older sister however, and occasionally borrow her old outfits; even her dresses. No-one seems to mind, and she certainly doesn't mind her 'little sibling' following her around, so you spend plenty of time hanging out with her friends, too, all of whom are girls much older then you."

That's fine, since you can get away with wearing some girl clothes underneath, like panties and a camisole. Your brother tolerates you now, but at least doesn't go out of his way to bully you.

You've maintained your skills, getting better with sewing and artistry with age - not your sister's level of course, but getting there. >The boys though like to pick on you. You might spend most of your time with the girls, but in the hallway you get pushed into lockers and tripped often. That doesn't stop them from staring at you, no matter how uncomfortable that feels. You know you like dressing up and wearing girl clothes, but definitely only like girls.

You were kind of shocked about everything - including your decent into femininity. You were able to bring up an image of yourself to get an idea of what changes happened.

You were the same height at least, but your hair was much longer than you ever wore it. It was a lighter color too and reached your shoulders. It was styled in some way you couldn't explain, but it looked large than you hair should, like someone had added more volume to it. "My mom's dropping us off at the movies, and there's a diner nearby," she took your hand in hers and tugged you toward the parking lot. "I thought maybe we'd get a bite to eat and then see the new anime that came out." You nodded again, smiling a little wider.

Instead she was wearing a nicer shirt and jeans. You look down at your own outfit, and shuffle your feet. "Is that okay?"

"Yeah," you nodded quickly. You hadn't even gone on a date in your old life and already was. With someone that you knew was hot too. You couldn't believe it. Natalie's bright smile returned. She darted forward and kissed your cheek. It started to flame and you glanced away.

"Cool," she said, before tugging on your hand again. You moved a little quicker now and climbed into the backsite of Natalie's mom's mini-van. She pulled out and let the two of you chat about your day and the newest anime or more Natalie let you go on and on your newest cosplay design. "Come on," you whisper, your voice now a little bit high-pitched and feminine.
You and Julia make your way out to the living room.
There you find your mother.
"Yes, sweeties."
You blush a bright shade of pink hearing that.
"I'm guessing you two want to go shopping?"
You and Julia shake your heads.
1131111211111.title: See if mom will take you two shopping

choices: Your mom comes up to talk
1131111211112.content:
You feel a ding in your head as the user interface pops up in front of you. You see Jake's name on one of the pages that says, "Current Party", his name then suddenly turns from Jake to Julia. You stifle a giggle before another pages interrupts your viewing of the party tab. It's your page, you see the Job title next to your name go from 'High School Freshman' to 'Primary School Student' with a [Pending] next to it. This shocks you but then a info box appears:

'Primary School Student' job title obtained - While in a institution for primary school students, you gain a double the experience points. Additionally, information meant for a primary school student, including social, physical and mental info, you have advantage on learning. However, While in any institution that outranks this job, you have disadvantage to persuasion checks (For example schools of higher education level, professional jobs, etc.), you have disadvantage in learning any information that is not meant for primary school students and experience gained from gaining that info is cut down to a quarter of its effectiveness.

You also gained the Perk: 'No Boys Allowed' - From now on, anyone within a proximity of 20 feet. to you gains a passive +5 to femininity until they leave that range and automatically gain femininity when they level in that range. This is treated as a debuff to boys and as a result you have disadvantage when you try to persuade them. The effect does not effect boys or adults who are either in Secondary School or Higher or are professionals in the workplace environment. It is not longer treated as a debuff to boys when they either gain enough femininity, lose enough masculinity or graduate primary school.

You giggled once again, Julia giggling with you but not understanding why. You didn't know what to do with this information but it sounded like fun and heck maybe primary school would be super fun?
1131111211112.title: Big kid no more?

choices: Level up your Homemaker skill by helping your mom
Go to your room and try to discover new skills
1131112.content:
Your were literally skipping around your room thinking about how much fun you had with Susie today and how much fun you could have tomorrow. She'd said that if you felt still felt like hanging out with her she was going to invite some of her friends over to play with too! Your currently stat reduced 7 year old mind couldn't wait! But your thoughts off playing dress up and other games with your sister and her friends went on hold for a minute as your mother opened the door. "Erik, I need you to come down to the kitchen and get your chores finished before I can cook dinner. You've had enough time to play around."

"Chores? But I don't wanna!" You said as you stopped your foot and crossed your arms in frustration. Normally you would have just shugged and reluctantly done your chores as quickly as you could, but your current mind was in no mood for anything but playing.

"Now listen hear young man, when we agreed that you were allowed to have an allowance you agreed that you would do all of your chores without complaints. Now you get a move on or not only will you not get any allowance this week you'll be grounded. Understand!"

You almost wanted to cry. No allowance? But that would mean you couldn't by new toys and dolls to play with! You couldn't have that, and you wanted your mom to think of you as a big boy. So you hold back the tears you almost cried and went to the kitchen with your mom. As you walked you were brought back to (your RPG related) Earth with a loud Ding. You looked up and saw that you'd gotten a skill point in "Listen to your mother" under the "Obedient Child" job class. 'Well, it won't be as neat as dress up, but I guess doing the chores won't be all stupid' you thought to yourself.

When you got to the kitchen your mom told you, "Go do the dishes from earlier while I start cooking. And make sure to wear the rubber gloves as you scrub." You put on the big yellow rubber gloves that were by the sink and felt something click. It looks like the gloves were going to give you an xp boost. Feeling kind of excited again at the idea of hearing the ding go off more you began to scrub. Sure enough after a few minutes a ding went off in your mind and you accessed the tabs before you to see that a new job class and set of skills had opened up.

Job Class: Homemaker
Skill: Dishwashing- Level 1

Your eyes lit up seeing that you weren't even a 1/4 through the dishes. You might be able to get a new skill! Now with a new found passion for cleaning you'd never had before you finished all of the dishes and sure enough as you put away the lash glass you heard the third ding and sure enough the dishwashing skill had leveled up to 3. Looking at the skills menu you saw what you were looking for.

Job Class: Homemaker Level 1: New Ability Unlocked. Without Asking 1- 20% XP bonus on household activities done without being asked.

Excited at this new skill you also looked at your other stats.
Your Femininity had elevated from 30 to 32
Your Masculinity went from 79 to 78
Your mental Age had gone shot up to being close to your normal mental age going from 7 to 10

Now that you'd finished your chores you could go back to your room and play video games or something. There may be skills in that to unlock, or you could stay with your mom and put that new ability to use and help her out.
1131112.title: Your Mom asks you to do something

11311121.content:
You were thinking about what do to do next. Finally you decided that continuing with "Homemaker" path would be better because you already got some levels in it. It will be easier for you to get new abilities. You also found cleaning surprisingly satisfying. With that in mind you found your mother, who was still in the kitchen preparing dinner.
- Is there anything I can help you with, mum? - you asked shyly. Your mother seemed surprised but she quickly answered.
- You could go and make a laundry. - she said to you. You eagerly agreed and went downstairs. There you found a washing machine and a pile of dirty clothes laying on the floor. You begun sorting clothes and putting them into machine. Then you set it up and the process begun. You heard the ding. You got a point in "Doing Laundry". You saw that ability "Without asking" was working and it gave you nice boost to exp. After the machine finished, you took out the clothes and hung them on dryer. After that you went onto next pile of clothes.

When you finished hanging the last article of clothing. "Doing Laundry" gotten to level 5 which also gave you level 2 in "Homemaker" job class. You knew that at 3 level you would get new ability. Then you decided to check your stats.

Your femininity went from 32 to 35
Your masculinity fell from 78 to 73
Your dexterity went from 1 to 3.
You also saw that your mental age was now 11.

You closed the tab and wondered on what to do now. You knew that you were close to getting another ability from "Homemaker". The second thing was that you still was thinking about playing video games and gain some levels in that area.
11311121.title: Level up your Homemaker skill by helping your mom

choices: Put on the dress and apron combo
113111211.content:
You decide to continue cleaning.
Currently, "Without Asking" was still in effect, so you grab the broom and get to work. As you work around the house, you make sure to pick up every little thing that's been left on the floor. You hear dings. Usually in sets of two, but they don't seem to bother you. You just hum a tune, something you might have learned from Mom. She's kind of cute when she's like that.
Once done, you check your stats. Which now showed 'Sweeping' at Level 4, with "Picking stuff up" at Level 3.

Your femininity went from 35 to 58
Your masculinity fell from 73 to 50
Your dexterity went from 3 to 5.
You also saw that your mental age was now 19.

Currently, you were outside of your room, but something caught your eye. It appears to be a dress and apron combo.
113111211.title: You continue with cleaning

choices: You decide to act on your plan
1131112111.content:
You're not sure what it is, but you put the new outfit on.
It feels a bit odd at first, but you could get used to it.
"Hmm..." you thought. "Back to cleaning."
You return to your cleaning routine. While Mom is nowhere to be found, your thoughts seem fixated on your mom. There's something about her, maybe it's way she giggles, or perhaps all the meals she makes just for the two of you.
So what if she's already taken? You could just change father.
1131112111.title: New Clothes

choices: She is sort of for it, just with some changes

Now dressed, you check a nearby clock.
While it would be a couple hours before your father would show up back home. Time to act.
"Oh mom?" you call out, watching your mother.
"Anna, how many times must I remind you." your mother explained. "It's Delia."
You give a nod and tell her your plan.
11311121111.title: Tell mom your plan

choices: You try to level "Fashionista" job class by applying makeup.
1132.content:
While you were sitting you spotted that the show which Sam was watching was one of her favorite fashion shows. It was aimed toward teenage girls. Topics varied from makeup tips to fashion styles. It was usual girly stuff that you tried so hard to avoid. After thinking about it you decided that you might as well give it a try and see what changes. You focused your sight on the screen and tried to take in as much information as you could.

At first it was getting rather boring. Women on the screen where showing different outfits and clothes that complimented one another. They also were describing how to match them together. You were close to falling asleep after 5 min of watching but then you heard a loud ding in your mind. You leveled a skill called "Clothes matching" in the "Fashionista" job class. Before you could think about it, a tutorial window appeared.

"Leveling up skills is super important! It affects everything! Leveling them up not only makes you better at the skill but it also gives you stat changes and goes to leveling up your job class. Your overall level is affected by the total of all your job class levels plus one. Leveling up job classes also changes stats and provides unique abilities. In order to level a job class to level one, you need to have the total level of all skills in that class to be 3. Requirements to level the class further will require higher total skill levels. If you want to boost your skill exp gain even more, equipping items associated with that class can boost you exp gain, they also affect how fast your stats change and provide bonuses/lower certain stats."

Then window closed and you were left processing given information. You saw that show moved on to makeup part. Right now women were giving tips on how to properly paint your nails. At this moment you finally spotted that Sam left her portable makeup kit on the table in front of you. Pink nail polish was one of the many items she had in there. You decided that since you already were watching tips on painting nails you might as well give it a try. You picked up the bottle, focused your attention on the show, and begun applying glossy pink nail polish on your fingernails. You made sure to follow every instruction given by the show. Before long the color of your fingernails matched that of the bottle. You didn't know what to think about it. You checked your equipment in game tab and saw that nail polish gave you 2x bonus to exp while doing activities associated with femininity stat. It also boosted your overall femininity by 3 which made your overall feminity to go from 4 to 7.

Show's host stated that after short commercial break they would focus on makeup tips for beginners. With that you wondered what do next.
1132.title: You watch Sam's show

Try and recruit one of your friends
114.content:
You continued looking at the tabs with confusion until you noticed anther one. It was a tab that said [Party]. "Could I bring someone else into this strange event?" you wondered. It was worth looking at the least. You opened it up and were immediately greeted with a flashing notification that said: tutorial. Then a strange message explaining the party tab appeared.

[Welcome, normally tutorials will not be used in order to let you learn it on your own, but this tab is special. By telling other people about this game you are able to try and recruit them into your party. If recruited, as long as they are near then you can see their stats. They too have full access to the menu and are part of the game, but only when with you. The benefits of party members are special abilities obtained by increasing your relationships with your party members. Party members also give you exp bonuses for skills and jobs related to them. Lastly they have unique abilities that support and affect you while they are in the party, the potency of these skills increase with your relationship with them.

It was strange thinking of other people being involved in this weird game. It seemed like it could be really interesting and useful. On the other hand if you weren't careful it might backfire against you. "I need to pick the right person." You really wanted to try this out and see how it worked. "Who to pick though?"
114.title: You notice the party tab?

Similarly your mother would know what to do. After some thought you picked out...

choices: You do something at home first
1151.content:
You are Albert, 21 years old and you play video games, mostly RPGs. About ninety percent of your entire library of games are RPGs. You worked in an office building as a Personal assisstant to one of the higher ups.

---

You Woke up early that Morning having work that day. you were able to eventually open your eyes. However, something strange struck you. instead of seeing your celing, you saw an odd overlay obscuring your vision. It said, among other things, in Bold letters.

[Your Life!:The Game:The Reality]

'What the?' you groggily squeaked out as the text box disappeared only to be replaced by an all too familiar UI.

It had your name listed with a couple of drop down menus titled [Jobs], [Skills], [Titles], [Stats] and [Relationships].
With a tap from your finger the Stats menu opens up and it is huge. Though you were listed as level 1, There seemed to be a stat for everything, health and the usual stats were there but coupled some obscure ones: Physical Age and Mental Age, Masculinity and Femininity, etc. it was nuts!

He looked more closely at what the overlay said about himself.

[Job] Personal Assistant.
[Skills] Typing, Organization
[Titles] Sir, Mr,
[Stats] Strength 5 Intelligence 7 Charisma 4 Endurance 5
[Relationship] Emily-Sister-10 Ms. Christine Williams-Boss-25

The list went on and on...

You'd have to figure out what the hell was going on later, you had to get going on your morning, you could check this out more at work.
1151.title: A Young adult

11512.content:
You got up and showered, noting a small icon in the corner of his eyes,

Cleanliness up

You got out of the shower and changed into your work clothes

You had some time before you had to leave so you decided to finish off the dishes you left out last night.

New Skill: Dishwashing
New Skill: Homemakeing
Femininity up
Cleanliness up.

"Wait femininity? for washing dishes? that's sexist..." you say to nobody. "I'm talking to myself now, I really am losing it"

You finished up and put them away, before heading out.

On the way to work you realized you had forgotten to shave but a glance in the rear-view mirror shows that you didn't need to this Morning, you're face looked clean shaven.

As you pull into work, you begin to worry about all these RPG stats, you take a moment after shutting down the car to glance in the mirror, looking through the stats and menues you can see.

After barely 10 seconds of idly looking towards the mirror another pop up appears.

Vanity- Femininity up.

"What! shit," you angrily get out of the car and head into your office.

"Morning Ms Williams." You say Politely to your boss as you pass her office

Deference-Submissiveness up

You grumble silently.

"For the Last time Al, call me Christine." she responds with a smile

Courtesy up

New Class: Office Errand Boy.

"Ok now..." you whisper under your breathe, "Now its just being mean.

You try to forget about all this RPG stuff, and get some work done, First thing get those reports from Chuck.

Done and Done,

Next you headed To Amy's desk and asked if the Copier repair guy had been by.

You took the complement and headed outside to get Christine and Yourself something to perk you up.

"Thanks Ally."

New Nickname Earned: Ally

You notice a small checkbox had appeared in the overlay, there were two names, Albert, with Nicknames Al, and Ally, and Ally was checked and Bold, and you couldn't figure out how to switch back to Al.

"Great...."

You sigh with relief as 5:00 came work was over, you'd spent the last several hours doing your best to ignore.

He'd gotten some work done, until lunch time when he went and got everyone's lunch orders and went out to pick them up, he ate with Amy and they talked about work and stuff. afterwords The Receptionist had to leave work early due to a Family emergency, and Christine had asked you to man the front desk in case someone was needed there. Ms. Christine Williams-Boss/Close Friend/Like sisters-75
11512112.title: Work comes to an end.

choices: Recruiting mischievous creatures to mess with them
12.content:
You are an imp residing in the forest of beginnings. You joined the Demon lord's army not out of malice or a desire to kill but self preservation. Heroes and hunters often massacred your kind to quickly boost their abilities and since you are cursed with the 'demon fodder' curse, all of your stats except your health and mana are cut in half. Imps, being cousins to fairies, have always had one of the largest mana pools, but that doesn't really help you when you can barely take a punch.

One such punch came from a knight trying to teach the newly budding heroes how to fight. However, as you felt the life leave your body. You woke up on the tenth day you had joined the Demon lord's army as if the previous 5 days never happened. But, you remember. The pain you felt was fresh in your mind. You vowed to nip the cause in the bud and kill a hero in their sleep to avoid that fate. His small stature and ability to disguise himself made coming up on the young boy in his sleep easy. However, as soon as you slid the blade into his heart, you woke up. On the tenth day once again, for the third time.

If you die, you reset. If the heroes die, you reset! You are so scared but you have to find a way, a way to keep yourself alive without killing the heroes. But, they will try to kill you or any of your kin on sight! The only option you can think of is to transform and manipulate the heroes to make them incapable of fighting in deadly combat until the Demon Lord is defeated by someone else!
12.title: Every Hero-Fodder has his Day

choices: Transformed your looks into a hero with pointy ears
Transformation failed miserably. You turned into a....
122.content:
The imp watched the sun go down and the world became less active. You could still hear fighting here and there but it still felt more peaceful. You traveled around mindlessly, thinking of how to avoid the reset until you accidently came across an alchemist. It was a young girl with big red hair and mediaval witch clothing. She was carrieng a big sack of items yet to be stored into a bank. You two noticed each other and stared at each other for a moment. She seemed to hesitate, something was wrong here. And then you noticed. She only had 1 hp left. Even an imp like you could finish her of. But that would also cause a reset. What should you do? You decided to bargain:
"I want a transformation potion and in exhange I will protect you until you get to safety"
She was hesitated for a moment but then decided to agree to your proposal. She threw a bottle with pink liquid to you. With gratefulness you barely managed to capture it. You didnt delay a second and opened the flask and drank it all.
122.title: Making transformation potions

You put up a camp at the spot

This was how you turned yourself into a hero. It was a strange feeling. You could feel that the transformation wasnt 100% complete. You are not a hero, not really. You are still a monster. Despite your looks, you looked like a hero and you were sure you could fool anyone. At least, if it wasnt for the ears. The ears are too pointy, as if you were an elf.
The only give away. But it was night, it was dark. Might as well give it a try.
"Hi, Im Yo-imp." You thought it was a good hero name. "Whats your name?"
"Im Angelica." She replied. You understood the name ment angel and you agreed, She did seem like an angel. Your heart was beating faster for some reason. Was this a side effect of the transformation?
"I did promise to help you and Im gonna keep my promise." You ensured her and what happened next was...
1221.title: Transformed your looks into a hero with pointy ...

choices: Find a weak hero to try out your magic
123.content:
You decide to focus on the one advantage that you have over most heroes, your magical abilities. If you wanted something that would work, it would best be something you would still have if the world was reset. After some thought,you knew what you needed. Imp legends spoke of powerful magic that had long since been lost to demonkind. If you could have that power then you could do practically anything to those heroes. You could transform them, change their personalities,even corrupt them into demons themselves. Thinking about all the things that would be at your grasp you headed towards the closest place known to house lost magic, the Lost Tower of Anglmarl.

Nobody had ever entered the tower and left alive. You quickly learned why when you entered the tower and was swiftly killed by a unsuspecting trap. It was constant reset after reset as you struggled to learn the traps and dangers of the tower, slowly getting higher up each time. Eventually you had made it to the top and saw a vast library of spellbooks. You grabbed a bunch of them and began studying them finding dozens of powerful spells that you could use. You could even use the spells to influence lesser demons and creatures into helping you deal with the heroes. You had also learned spells that let you enter the top and entrance of the tower at will to avoid the traps. With that, you only had to decide what to do next.
123.title: Studying lost magic

choices: Try to get him to change out of his armor
Try to get him to take a part time job
1231.content:
An Imp's forte in illusion magic if they want to survive. disguising yourself as a human child was one of your greatest strengths. Now with the lost Imp magic from the library, your illusions could be that much more vivid and effective at manipulating others. Deciding to test it, you went back to the starting zone to find one of the budding heroes.

Your hopes were met when you discovered the little scoundrel that you tried to kill training by himself, by human years, he looked about 13 years old though you didn't really care. You began your plan buy finding his water canteen and placing an enchantment into the water. Then, you made him perceive a great heat wave, even if the heat wave wasn't real he still sweated up a storm that made his swings sluggish as he licked his lips in thirst.

Eventually, he had take a swig of his canteen, whose water had been supplemented by your magic, now you can whisper thoughts to mess with him. You may be trying to save your life but your playful and prank loving nature as an Imp made it hard to resist.

The boy eventually walked back to the town.
1231.title: Find a weak hero to try out your magic

choices: Get him to buy a new outfit
12311.content:
The boy was walked around town to find someplace to relax for a little bit. As he thought about where to go he had a strange thought. "I should take off my armor." The boy didn't know why he was thinking about removing his armor, he needed it after all. "It is is really hot though. I should remove my armor to cool down" Another thought was placed into his head, while another heat wave hit him. He couldn't deny that he was really hot and needed to cool down.

He first went to a shaded alleyway in order to cool down, but it didn't help much. He was still cooking in that armor of his. "I need to get out of this armor." The boy was finding it hard to resist. Eventually he caved in and started stripping out of his armor. Metal fell to the floor as he took it off piece by piece. When it was all gone, he was embarrassed having forgot about how little he wore under his armor. He just had a somewhat long tunic and some underwear. "I don't need my armor." With another thought whispered to him, the boy knew that putting back on the armor wasn't an option. Meanwhile You were watching and could barely contain your laughter. The magic was working and now the boy was no longer a knight but rather some half naked boy. You wondered if you should go further messing with the boy.
12311.title: Try to get him to change out of his armor

choices: Get him to wear a Lolita outfit
Get to wear a women's uniform for a non-combat job
123111.content:
"I should buy some more clothes." Another thought popped into his head, he had to admit walking around in just a long tunic was not really a good idea. Heading to a local store, he meant to turn at the more normal looking clothing shop which sold pants and shirts at cheap price. But another thought came, "I should wear nicer clothes from a fancier shop." the thought said. "I'm a hero after all." it continued.

"Yeah", he thought. "Maybe I should buy something better, I am risking my life after in this heat." he thought indignantly. He looked for a more expensive looking store when the thought came back, "I should go here, this looks just fancy enough for me." When the boy looked at the store, it was clearly a dress store. The outfits clearly feminine and girly and not designed for combat. "Why would I go in here, I'm a man!" he thought in protest, trying to resist the thought's words. "No, I'm the hero and I should shop here." His thoughts were mixed with confusion and embarrassment as he felt his own mind telling him to go in when he also believed he shouldn't.

This was something you never really understood about human culture. Gender was a fluid concept in the demon world so it was never holistically as important but teasing humans about was one of the greatest forms of entertainment out there. Succubi and Incubi were known to sometimes play with their victims in such a fashion, forcing them to dress as the opposite sex to humiliate them as they craved their bodies.

Eventually, the boy entered the store, struggling against his own judgement. The selection was wide and fashion was Feminine as a thought came once again.
123111.title: Get him to buy a new outfit

choices: Get him to continue improving his look
1231111.content:
"I need to find the right outfit" his thoughts said. The boy blushed with embarrassment looking at all the girly dresses and clothes surrounding him. In the middle of looking around, the thoughts came again. "I should get those, they are perfect for a hero like me." The boy got even more conflicted when he saw that his thoughts were pointing him to an area filled with Lolita clothing. Frilly dresses and all kinds of accessories surrounded them not a single one even remotely useful for combat. The boy blushed in embarrassment wondering why he would even think of wearing such girly clothing. "I'm a man, and men don't wear frilly dresses!" The boy thought again in protests. "I am a hero and heroes deserve to treat themselves" The thoughts told him shutting down his protest. The boy thought he did deserve some nice treatment as a reward for risking his life.

Despite his doubts and worries, the boy walked over to the section staring at all the girly clothing. "That dress would look perfect on me" The thoughts told him, and the boy went into shock as he looked at the dress before him. It was a frilly and lacy black and white knee length dress. It had tons of petticoats giving it a wide skirt, while tons of little black bows went across the circumference of the skirt with white ribbons connecting them. The hem of the dress was multiple layers of white frills with each one a bit longer than the previous one. The dress had a white strip going down the middle of the top to the skirt with tiny black bows in it. A couple of white frills formed a large outline of a heart in the center of the dress. Finally there was a black ribbon bow at the collar.

The boy couldn't believe that he was considering wearing the dress, it was the girliest thing that he had ever seen. "I should get this dress, every hero should have something as pretty as this." The thoughts spoke up to quell his protests.The boy wanted to resist, but it was his own thoughts telling him to do it. The boy thought he might as well listen and what happened. The boy picked up the dress, feeling the incredibly soft fabric in his hands. He hoped that that was it, but the thoughts came again. "I should get some accessories, a dress like this deserves some extras." The boy kept trying to protest in his mind, but the thoughts always seemed to win out. The boy picked up a pair of elbow length black gloves with white frills at the ends, and black stockings with white hearts on them. The process continued as he grabbed black mary janes with 2 inch heels and a frilly white headband. Finding himself holding a ton of incredibly girly clothing, the boy was becoming more confused than ever. "Is this me? Have I always had this side of me? Why else would my thoughts be so determined to wear these?" The boy wondered trying to make sense of why he was doing this. Finally he picked up a pair of black panties that were adorned with frills and bows.

With that done, the boy went to go pay for the clothes. He had an embarrassed look on his face while the female clerk giggled giving him a compliment on his great taste in fashion. A good bit of the money that the boy had was being eaten for his new clothes. The moment he had payed for them, the boy scuttled into the changing room to change into the outfit. When it finally all on him, the boy didn't know how to feel. "I love how soft this dress is, a hero should always wear a pretty dress" The thoughts told the boy. He had to admit that it was soft and in a sense comfortable although also constricting. "I shouldn't wear this though, I can't fight in this!" The boy tried another attempt to protest despite knowing it was near futile. "A hero like me doesn't need to fight. Hero's just need to be pretty and beautiful." The thoughts threw back at him. Honestly, the boy didn't feel much like a hero at that moment. He felt more like a dainty doll.
1231111.title: Get him to wear a Lolita outfit

choices: He is compelled to be instructed on proper etiquette
He meets a stoic, strong looking woman
12311111.content:
The boy left the store and awkwardly walked around town, his doubts about the clothes still persisting. Just then he looked around, did the town seem nicer for some reason? Just then a thought came, "Once a I put on these clothes, I started to see the town in better light. Maybe, I should work on moving in these clothes better." This was a thought the boy had to agree with. Thanks to altering his perception slightly, the town seemed cleaner, more colorful, nicer and just down right pleasant. And all you had to do was attribute this to the clothes.

Despite wearing a big frilly dress, he felt cool. Despite his initial embarrassment, he felt calm and happy. 'Maybe the dress was the right thing to do.' He thought to himself. He stopped to try and reorient his posture to make it easier to walk and after a few false starts he began to stroll down the street checking out the stall and conversing with some of the townsfolk. Before it felt drab and boring but now he was thrilled and engaged.

Just then...
12311111.title: Get him to continue improving his look

choices: The lady invites him to a salon
123111111.content:
Soon another thought popped into the boy's mind. "Maybe if I act more proper than I will feel even better." The boy thought that it was a nice idea and started looking around for someone that could help him. After a bit of searching he found a girl that was also wearing a frilly Lolita dressed. The boy walked over to her and complimented her pretty outfit, and the lady smiled as she did the same. The boy blushed a little at someone gushing over how pretty he looked. "She definitely knows how to act in a proper manner, she can help me." The thoughts told the boy and he couldn't agree more.

The boy asked the lady if she could help him with etiquette and she happily agreed. First the lady helped fix his posture and the way he walked. She told him to saintly pick up his skirts whenever he walked. Next she focused on the way he spoke, first helping him speak in a softer,feminine, and more elegant sounding voice. Then she taught him a lot of new vocabulary and stopping him from using any crude language or slang. Finally was lessons about proper greetings with him learning things such as how to curtsey and what to say and when. When they were finished, the boy gave her a curtsey happy now that his every movement and word exuded pure elegance.
123111111.title: He is compelled to be instructed on proper etiq...

choices: You see a young Valkyrie hero
Time reset, a hero must have died
1231111111.content:
His new mentor invited him to a salon to fix his hair and treat him to a nice relaxing spa treatment, Which he accepted easily. He followed behind her, minding his posture and taking the time to engage in conversation with the nice woman. She said, "If you are truly interested, young lady. I'd be willing to take you under my wing to properly teach you the skills us respectable ladies use in our everyday lives.

The idea intrigued him and the thought was all for it as well, so once again he accepted. The salon and spa did their job splendidly, the boy came out of the store nearly unrecognizable, any trace of warrior that may have been apparent was gone looking at the figure who now resembled a lovely young lady. The woman took him by the hand and began to walk him to her house, a home-stay for royalty and diplomats traveling the country.

The boy looked to you like his hero days were over before they even started now, his capacity to even think of swinging a sword now marred by thoughts of poise and refinement. 'That's one down, plenty more to go' You thought as you looked for a new hero.

Suddenly...
1231111111.title: The lady invites him to a salon

choices: You enchant her weapons and armor
12311111111.content:
You see a young women clad in armor that had multiple wing designs on it. You recognized the girl as being a Valkyrie, a faction of female warriors that loved to fight. The girl had a big smile on her face as she headed into the nearby forest.

You disguised yourself and followed her, hoping for an opportunity. The Valkyrie was hunting and enjoying the thrill of it. She hoped that a warrior to duel or a bigger monster to slay would appear. Hours went by and you could only watch. She was in a bloodthirsty state right now and seemed to notice every little sound and sight. Eventually the Valkyrie returned to the town for a short rest before she went back on her way. You knew that this was your best chance while she was distracted
12311111111.title: You see a young Valkyrie hero

choices: Her using the armor and spear
The plan backfires- she ends up dying
123111111111.content:
Disguising yourself as a young girl skipping by, you cast a spell on her spear and armor. As she wore and used them, she would grow more and more infatuated with nature and peace, eventually to the point of renouncing fighting altogether.

The thrill that came with this paradoxical existence of magical armor was enough to distract you from the dread that was time resetting. You knew she would never forsake her armor, Valkyrie were known for their pride as well as their skill in combat. The woman took a swig of rum at the local tavern before heading back to the hunt.
123111111111.title: You enchant her weapons and armor

choices: The Valkyrie takes a moment to take in her surroundings
1231111111111.content:
You watched as the women went back into the forest. It wasn't long before she had found her first prey and quickly killed it. For some reason the women felt strange after killing it. She brushed it off before returning to the hunt. Creature after creature fell to her swift thrusts and keen eyes. Each time she killed one, she felt weirder and weirder.

The woman found it strange, but her enjoyment of the hunt was quickly diminishing. More and more, she was feeling guilty and sad that they creatures had to die. A lingering thought in the back of her mind asked if there wasn't a peaceful way. The Valkyrie also noticed that her normal focus on everything around her was starting to slip.The sounds of nature around her usually were just used to help her hunt, but now they were becoming distracting to her.
1231111111111.title: Her using the armor and spear

She decides to study botany and learn natural medicines from it.
12311111111111.content:
The Valkyrie began to wander, looking up at the trees and plants and animals, she thought they all seemed rather beautiful. Gliding her had across the trees tough bark felt strangely comforting to her. The way the light touched it and how animals depended on it was beautiful in way she had never really quite thought about. Looking down, she saw a babbling brook nearby. The once again put her hand out, this time gently placing her hand in the water. The fish reacted differently to her than usual, they swam closer to her now that her body was settled. It made her chuckle happily seeing this.

The Valkyrie thought that she should protect this moment, these creatures, this forest, she would find a way.
12311111111111.title: The Valkyrie takes in her surroundings

123111111111112.content:
The Valkyrie decided that she wanted to become a botanist. She wanted to use the wonders of nature to help others. With her mind made up, she tossed away her armor and weapons as she headed into town. First she got some new more fitting clothes. After getting changed, she looked for someone to mentor her. The former Valkyrie asked a nearby florist and was pointed in the direction of one of the village elders, who made natural medicine. She went to talk to the elder and she agreed to teach the woman about botany and natural medicine. The women was overjoyed, she didn't know why she used to be so violent, but now she never had to worry about hurting another creature ever again.

You were happy to see that now two heroes were rendered completely harmless by your hands. It was tons of fun to mess with heroes, and it meant less people in the world that could hurt you. You decided to start moving on to a bit bigger village. You didn't think that there was many good heroes to practice on here. Soon you would have to deal with more powerful heroes, especially the heroes guild. The heroes guild had tons of dangerous heroes that you might come across in the future. The mischievous side of you did think it would be fun to take care of a entire branch of the heroes guild eventually. Either way, you headed out to a new destination.

On the way...
123111111111112.title: She decides to study botany and learn natural m...

1231111111111121.content:
Traveling down to the city you see a Mercenary hero, bragging about the demons he had killed to lady trying to do her shopping, she obviously did not care for it but when she left, the hero slapped her on the ass and asked her for her name, which she obviously declined as she walked away.

You nearly began to wheeze as you laughed, "The best targets are always ones with personality." You said to yourself. However, as the hero sauntered towards a local tavern, you saw a womanly figure eyeing him. The figure's illusion was quite powerful but you easily recognized it as a succubus.

"Damn, if she gets to him, she'll probably kill him after sex." You thought as you bit your lip in frustration. "Calm down, calm down. This provides me with a unique opportunity. If I try to purify a succubus, making her chaste and pure despite her demonic, lustful nature, She would not kill him and I could use her new reserved nature as a catalyst for the hero's."

"Then again that's a little riskier and probably take longer, although the info would be useful even if it were to fail, but I could make a deal with her to get her a new lovely servant but, that also risks the hero dying afterwards."

"Decisions, Decisions..."
1231111111111121.title: You see a womanizing, arrogant, mercernary

12311111111111211.content:
You didn't want to risk a hero dying. You didn't know what would happen to the heroes you already turned harmless. Plus it would be nice testing your magic on other demons. When the succubus wasn't looking you cast a spell on her. Whenever she flirted or touched a man, her lust would decrease and she would slowly be purified.

You watched as the succubus approached the mercenary. He bought her a drink and began boasting of his accomplishments again to her. She pretended to enjoy his stories although she was beginning to feel a bit weird. Normally she was dripping with lust, but now she was pretty low by her standards. She invited him to come with her for the night after he was done drinking, but she began doubting if she should. Later the mercernary put his hand on her ass, and the succubus reeled a bit at the touch. She didn't know why she was acting so strange.
12311111111111211.title: Purify the Succubus first

choices: The succubus takes a stroll the next morning
123111111111112111.content:
The succubus excused herself saying she needed to freshen up before they left, giving him a little wink. In the bathroom, she nearly began to cringe. She felt off, more than off she felt so, so wrong. It was the first day in her entire life that she ever felt turned off. 'How is this even possible?' she panicked in her head. She needed sometime alone to think and calm down, so she snuck out the back door and headed back to her room at a local inn. Removing her disguise, she looked in the mirror to see nothing wrong, her body was not sickly looking, no deterioration or weakness in her appearance. Her tail still lively swaying, her horns undamaged and her breasts were still plump and sensitive. She took a deep breath as she tried to relax calling it quits for the night.

You weren't really surprised by how fast she had progressed, except for the running away part, A demon that can control people's lust was bound to have triggered the spell quite frequently in the beginning. Once she is purified, aside from her magic losing it's killing edge, little will probably change, she will still have that demonic appearance and her illusion magic, if a bit weaker, and her natural control over the lust of others. She will however be able to live and maintain her health without sex though, not like she wouldn't be able to though.
123111111111112111.title: The succubus excuses herself

choices: The succubus runs into a kindly nun
1231111111111121111.content:
The next morning, the Succubus woke up and decided that a nice stroll might make her feel better. She put her disguise back on although this time using an illusion of much less revealing clothes. The Succubus left the inn as she walked down through the streets. She couldn't help but feel that the world seemed to be much brighter and happier. She talked around with the villagers, happy to get to know them better as they talked about the weather and other small things.

She was amazed by how wonderful of a day it was. The sun was shining bright and she loved the gentle breeze in the air. She thought that it might be a good idea to settle down here, it seemed to be a great place. The succubus could tell that some men were still eying her, but instead of being turned on she was just embarrassed. She was giving up on trying to figure out why she was in this slump. She thought it was best to just relax and enjoy herself and she would be back to normal in time.
1231111111111121111.title: The succubus takes a stroll the next morning

12311111111111211111.content:
Along her walk, the Succubus ran into a kind nun. The two strike up a conversation and head onward to the church where the nun worked. Normally, she would stick away from these sorts of places. But today, something seemed different. Maybe it was the slump she had found herself or perhaps the feeling of kindness that her new friend seemed to give her.

Inside, the church felt welcoming and open. Nun buzzed all about, helping the wounded and take care of the various orphans that resided here. By the time they had reached the back of the building, a sense of purpose seemed to awaken within the succubus. It was something she hadn't felt in quite some time. So she gave the woman a slight tap and...
12311111111111211111.title: The succubus runs into a kindly nun

123111111111112111111.content:
The succubus asked the nun if she could join their order, unintentionally breaking her illusion in the process. Yet, neither of them seemed to care in that particular moment as the succubus was led outside to a small building.

There, the succubus's measurements were carefully taken and she was fitted for her habit. Afterwards, the nun got to work training her succubus in the ways of god, faith and healing. And while at first she struggled with understanding such concepts, it eventually came through clearly. Next up was helping feed the children, where a variety of questions from the little ones seemed ready to tempt the succubus. Yet, she persevered and managed to answer their questions politely while not causing any trouble for either party.

While this didn't turn out the way you had hoped it would, you're fine with it. If nothing else, you've gotten rid of a potential competitor in your quest to be seen as number one in the eyes of master.
123111111111112111111.title: The succubus nun

choices: 'Direct' him into one of the dress shops
1231111111111121111111.content:
You return your attention back to the mercenary.
Currently, the mercenary was making his way through a part of the shopping district known for it's high quality dresses, especially their hoop skirts, princess-style dresses and ballroom gowns.
Maybe with a little persuasion, you can get him to trade in his adventuring ways for something far more... frilly.
1231111111111121111111.title: Back with the mercenary

12311111111111211111111.content:
You thought carefully about how best to get him into one of the dress shops. You thought it would be pretty fun to see him change into one of them. Eventually you had the perfect idea about how to deal with him.

You waited until it was the perfect time. Right now there was a young and beautiful young lady. Elegant and wearing the finest dresses she was a socialite about to enter one of the districts famous stores. You cast a spell on the mercenary that would cause him to become obsessed with the first person he saw. He would desire to become just like them, seeing them as a perfect role model.The longer he looked at the women the more he would change and his womanizing ways would be replaced with a love of gentlemen.

It worked just as plan as the socialite became the target for the mercenary. He couldn't take his eyes off of her. The mercenary usually was obsessed with any pretty girl he saw but this one was special. When she entered the dress store he knew that he had to follow her.
12311111111111211111111.title: 'Direct' him into one of the dress shops

choices: The socialite keeps looking at the mercenary
Her focus is on the dress
123111111111112111111111.content:
Inside, the dress shop was a lot larger than it appeared be from the outside. Dresses of all sorts seemed to line the walls, with an emphasis on dresses for special occasions, such as ballroom gowns and wedding dresses.
At the moment, the socialite was currently looking around. But her gaze seemed to alternate between a purple ballroom gown and her newest admirer..
123111111111112111111111.title: The mercenary in the dress store

choices: The socialite comes over and asks him out
1231111111111121111111112.content:
The socialite's focus shifts away from the mercenary and to the dress.
Of course, that mean that the mercenary was focusing in on it as well. His thoughts began to be filled with images of putting it on and wooing the lady. The woman moves on, shooting the mercenary a quick glance.
In a bout of what the other patrons would see as madness, the mercenary goes and finds an assistant. After a bit of talking, he somehow manages to talk her into letting him try it on.
Surprisingly, it fits him quite well. Add in the various petticoats, heels and other accessories brought over by the attendant, the socialite's attention seemed to be caught.
1231111111111121111111112.title: Her focus is on the dress

12311111111111211111111121.content:
The socialite made her way over, taking a look at the mercenary.
She mumbles something his way and the mercenary's face glows a bright shade of red. He answers with a response of his own and the two make their way out.
Cautiously, you follow behind.
Their first stop is at a salon, where the mercenary gets dragged on in. A few minutes pass and the two step out. Now, the mercenary's hair had gone from dreadful locks to a full-on fontange. Which, the socialite seemed to love, especially when combined with a freshly powdered face and bright red lips.
Following that, she led her companion to a nearby jewelry store. There, they come out with a tiara in the mercenary's hair with a set of dangle earrings to boot.
Then the socialite led her companion towards a large mansion.
12311111111111211111111121.title: Out and about

123111111111112111111111211.content:
At the mansion, the two were greeted by a pair of maids and led inside.
There, in a parlor room, the socialite worked her magic. She started with etiquette, drilling it into the mercenary quite successfully. Next came vocabulary, which went even smoother. After, she shoos her maids away and pulls the mercenary in.
A whisper under the socialite's breath later, the mercenary is gone. In place of him is now a lady-in-waiting. This is all sealed with a simple kiss between the two...

You continued to focus more on vast tomes of knowledge and spells that was collected in this Library.

ever you determination fuelled by your thirst for power and desires to not be killed led you to devouring as much knowledge as you can carry, but what you didn't know is that by going through all these books you were getting stronger by the laws of the world.

you're level and status as a basic lower imp was changing along with an increase in your stats, health and mana pool.

had you taken the time to check yourself out, then you would've noticed the large bold righting hovering above your head as you tore through pages *Level up!*.

you're appearance also changed due you stronger number in attribute.

gone was your red skin that was traditional in all imps as it turned dark into a dark purple tone with arcane tattoos decorating your limbs and chest in crop circle signs that faintly glowed and hummed with power, your small horns lengthened a bit with your tail sprouting from behind you in with a classic arrow head that sway left to right with excitement as you delved with much enthusiasm into the books before you.

but as you went through the tome you...?

what happens next?
1232.title: Continue learning more spells

12321.content:
in your searching through every page in each tome you went through, you came across a spell that peaked your interest.

It was a spell of possession that allowed the caster (you) to possess the bodies of targets that are lower level's then you and don't pass the risistance check against willpower.

however it is limited, should the caster target a being of a higher level or one with a willpower check that is close or higher then the caster then the possession will fail, if it is a success the limit of the possession is lessened then the original time limit.

You knew of this ability as many demons in service t the demon lord such as Succubus's used this power to sneak into places and conduct espionage on the humans or for personal gain.

liking this ability as it afforded you better options In evading humans or sneaking into their cities without raising attention.

deciding to go for it, you studied the ability till you learned it.

Ability learned: Possession.

Possession Lv 1: You can possess bodies but can only stand in one for a whole day before being evicted out of the host, the sustained spell is halved or quartered if used on a higher level target or one with a higher will check.

after learning the power, what do you decide to do now?
12321.title: you find a spell of possession

123211.content:
you decided to leave the tower of Anglmarl for now,

rearming the traps and putting a few more down for extra security, you left the safety of the hidden tower to venture out into the world with all the knowledge and spells you acquired.

As you walked away you decided to go to...?

where do you go?
123211.title: Leave the tower

1232111.content:
You track In the direction of a village that you knew was nearby.

How you knew was because you had not only died while learning of it but also because all village near here are known so as to conduct raids to enslave humans for labour or breeding.

Raiding parties for demons were large groups of demons with lower class demons such as goblins or imps like your self acting a the vanguard or first wave to weaken the defences and lower the defenders numbers at the expense of your life while the higher classes come in after to mop up the rest, with the leading commanders being either succubus or higher class demons all the way in the back commanding the raiding host from their safe position.

Captured men and children were used as labourers to build the war machines and work the fields while the women became servants to demon lords, acting as pleasure slaves or breeders to increase their numbers, when a female wasn't taken by a higher demon or lost favour with them they were left to the mercy of lower classes like goblins, imps and Orcs who mainly used them as brood mothers to further their own numbers.

Naturally some village were protected by guards and some even had their own magical practitioners who aided in their defence.

Before long you made it to the edge of the forest where not far away you spotted the village of Ara, a common village with an Inn, blacksmith, apothecary and of course farms to make their food.

You knew you couldn't just walk up to the village without getting your head cut off as humans were extremely hostile to demons and vice visa with demons to them.

But then you remembered you had the possession spell that you learned in the Lost Tower and so decided that the best way to walk in... was to walk in, in someone else's skin.

With that in mind, you plotted with new found cunning as to which unfortunate soul would host your presence within them.

Who do you possess?
1232111.title: A nearby villiage

12321111.content:
As you prowled around outside the boundaries of the village you searched for the perfect host outside the protection and eye's of the village when you spotted... her.

walking out with a care free smile with an empty basket In hand was a beautiful young woman, you lurked in the bushes at the corner where she was heading and there you used status view to see who she was and was shocked to see her title.

Name: Olivia Belfrost.

Title: Hero's fiancé

Level 4 Villager

Strength: 10

Endurance: 15

Magic: 5

cunning: 19

Willpower: 30

Occupation: Village healer.

You honestly couldn't believe your luck at finding the soon to be wife to a hero, but which you did not know or care as this was both a sign and an opportunity to advance in the demon world because if you could get close to a hero, you could not only learn their secret's but also gain the opportunity to kill them.

With that thought In mind you grinned maliciously at your target and followed after her as she walked deep into the forest and into a small clearing where an apple tree awaited with ripe fruit hanging from it's limbs.

You snuck up behind the woman who was humming a tune that obscured approaching footsteps.

Smirking wickedly you casted the spell "POPO" you said and felt as the magic swelled up within your body, making it translucent and weightless as your ghostly form hovered above the ground "Now to exact my plan." you said in a echoing tone that her human ears wouldn't hear before you flew straight towards around her till you were face to face.

She couldn't see you and if she did then she would be running for the hills.

You forced your way into her mouth, she froze, unable to speak or move as your ghostly form slithered into her body through her mouth until the last of you plunged in, and when it did all could do was drop to her knees and scream as loud as she could a she grasped her head with both hands and started to shake wildly.

You could feel her trying to fight you as you were within her mind scape but it was all for not as your will and magic was far more powerful then her's, it was a short battle as the consciousness of the female was pushed away into the darkest recesses of her mind and you assumed control.

Outside Olivia stay on the ground kneeling, her screams became silent as her body stopped shaking.

The peaceful scene of the meadow was interrupted as she soon began to stand up, he head ever dipped forward with her orange hair flowing down and shrouding her face.

She stood to her feet and raised her head where gone was the gentle serine smile as in place was a malicious sinister smirk that promised only pain and evil deeds a heads.

She then looked down to see the large mounds of her breast push out from her villagers gown, chuckling creepy she laughed out "Yes. I did it!" that laugh bellowed out into a twisted roar as she snapped her head up and let out her cheer before snapping it back down when she cupped her boobs "Aaaahhh~" she sang out as the sensations running through her form were euphoric.

"This is great." Olivia said except it was no longer Olivia but you. A level 5 Greater Imp currently in control of the villagers wife to be.

You were about to continue touching yourself when all of a sudden a cry rang out "Congratulations!" a voice called out prompting you to stop and twist your head in all directions to see who it was only to find no one so you looked up and beheld in gold bold writing the word the voice said before the status window opened up in it's place above your head.

Possession lv 1 progression 10%: further use of the spell and time within a host progresses the level. level limitation Lv 1: While in possession of a host you are unable to use your demonic power or any spells apart of the host's own abilities and skill set.

Olivia Corruption 3% Purity 97%

Corruption is a energy dark magical creatures such as demons give off because they are made from it. Corruption can affect area's that will twist and transform from what they original were with plant and wild life mutating into dangerous and aggressive creatures with toxic and poisonous plants sprouting out like weeds, snuffing the life out of the healthy plants nearby.

With Human it has a variety of afflictions all of which eat away at their will around demons, however corruption comes with a price when humans are influenced by too much, such afflictions include from mental instability to pure raving madness on those weak minded, others are more susceptible to demonic influence and possession with corrupted humans even going as far as to offer themselves as willing vessels to demons and other dark entities.

However it wasn't necessarily a bad thing as corruption did have it's benefits in both the appearance department, allure and spell power departments. Spell power is increased and altered depending on the level of corruption and original stats of the spell, for example a simple arcane bolt will pack twice the power from a high level corrupted mage then on a normal one.

Plus an enchanting allure radiates off of those with an acceptable amount of corruption, prime examples being dark witches and succubus who use this ability to enchant unsuspecting and defenceless men, add by the change in appearance with enhanced benefits to it.

Humans who have been possessed for too long may either become soulless husks or take on the twisted personality of their controller where they become loyal servants to them.

however there are most cases where sorcerers and witches are able to shrug off the usual aliments of corruption and use the dark magic they possess to their will however they are unable to cast any purity/ holy and healing spells.

If a human becomes overwhelm by too much demonic energy such as absorbing so much at once from possession or casting ritual then they will transform into hulking abominations with a primitive mind-set of destroying anything in their path.

It was good in a way for your current host to being corrupted by your presence within her as it will make possessing all the more easier later but you had to be careful as to break her mind and turn her into a raving mad woman or worse an abomination.
